title: Remove Motivational Videos (Life Lessons) section from frontend

requirements.summary: Remove the Motivational Videos / Life Lessons section from primary navigation and eliminate the videos library UI from the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The sidebar navigation in AppShell no longer shows a nav item for the Motivational Videos / Life Lessons section.
No page in the app renders the motivational videos grid, search, filters, favorites-only toggle, or YouTube player dialog UI.
The app builds without TypeScript errors after removing the section and any now-unused imports.

file_operations.description: Remove the Life Lessons (Motivational Videos) nav item from the sidebar navItems list and delete any now-unused imports/icons associated with it.

requirements.summary: Keep the '/mental-performance/life-lessons' route path stable, but ensure it no longer exposes the motivational videos experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating directly to '/mental-performance/life-lessons' does not show the motivational videos experience.
The route path string '/mental-performance/life-lessons' remains unchanged in the app routing configuration.
User-facing text shown on this route (if any) is in English and clearly indicates the section is no longer available, with an obvious way to navigate elsewhere.

file_operations.description: Add a simple removed-section page for '/mental-performance/life-lessons' that explains the section is no longer available and provides clear navigation back to an existing Mental Performance page (e.g., Recommended Reading or IZOF).

Keep the existing route path '/mental-performance/life-lessons' unchanged, but wire it to render the new LifeLessonsRemoved page instead of the motivational videos page; remove the old page import from the router module.

requirements.summary: Delete or fully decommission motivational-video-specific frontend modules, dead code, and progress/localStorage logic that is only used by the removed section.
acceptanceCriteria: The project has no unused imports referencing motivational-video-specific files (e.g., MotivationalLifeLessons page, MotivationalVideoCard, YouTubePlayerDialog, motivationalLifeLessonsVideos content, life lessons progress hook) after the change.
Any localStorage keys / progress logic used only by the removed section is no longer written to by the app.
The app runtime has no console errors related to removed motivational-video modules during normal navigation.

file_operations.description: Delete the motivational videos library page implementation so it cannot be rendered anywhere in the app.
Delete the motivational-video-specific card component (no longer used after section removal).
Delete the motivational-video-specific YouTube player dialog component (no longer used after section removal).
Delete the Life Lessons progress hook so the app no longer reads/writes life-lessons-specific localStorage progress.
Delete the motivational videos dataset/content module since the videos library experience is removed.
Delete the development-time validator tied to the removed motivational videos dataset.
Delete the Life Lessons display-name module after removing all references from navigation/routing.
Delete motivational-video-specific type definitions if no longer referenced by any remaining active feature.

Remove life-lessons-specific storage key/constants and the Life Lessons progress read/write helpers so the app no longer writes section-specific progress data to localStorage; ensure no remaining imports reference the removed motivational video types.
